Z-Shape Profile Definition
==========================



```
concept {
    IfcZShapeProfileDef:ProfileType -> IfcProfileTypeEnum
    IfcZShapeProfileDef:ProfileName -> IfcLabel
    IfcZShapeProfileDef:Position -> IfcAxis2Placement2D
    IfcZShapeProfileDef:Position -> IfcAxis2Placement2D
    IfcZShapeProfileDef:Depth -> IfcPositiveLengthMeasure
    IfcZShapeProfileDef:FlangeWidth -> IfcPositiveLengthMeasure
    IfcZShapeProfileDef:WebThickness -> IfcPositiveLengthMeasure
    IfcZShapeProfileDef:FlangeThickness -> IfcPositiveLengthMeasure
    IfcZShapeProfileDef:FilletRadius -> IfcNonNegativeLengthMeasure
    IfcZShapeProfileDef:EdgeRadius -> IfcNonNegativeLengthMeasure
    IfcAxis2Placement2D:Location -> IfcCartesianPoint
    IfcAxis2Placement2D:Location -> IfcCartesianPoint
    IfcAxis2Placement2D:RefDirection -> IfcDirection
    IfcAxis2Placement2D:RefDirection -> IfcDirection
}
```
